languages.text: {n}Маражай нетерпеливо щелкает пальцами.{/n} "Ну же? В чем заминка? Наше промедление может дать врагу преимущество. Или в последний момент тебя одолела сентиментальность?"
{n}Marazhai clicks his fingers impatiently.{/n} "Well? Why are we dawdling? Our delay may give the enemy the advantage. Or have you been overcome with sentimentality at the last moment?"
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай нетерпеливо щелкает пальцами.{/n} "Ну же? В чем заминка? Наше промедление может дать врагу преимущество. Или в последний момент тебя одолела сентиментальность?"

languages.text: {n}マラズハイはそわそわと指を鳴らしている。{/n}「で？何をもたもたしてるんだ？敵に隙を与えかねないぞ。それともなんだ、急に感傷的になっちまったのか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai clicks his fingers impatiently.{/n} "Well? Why are we dawdling? Our delay may give the enemy the advantage. Or have you been overcome with sentimentality at the last moment?"

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイはそわそわと指を鳴らしている。{/n}「で？何をもたもたしてるんだ？敵に隙を与えかねないぞ。それともなんだ、急に感傷的になっちまったのか？」

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋不耐烦地敲着手指。{/n}“嗯？我们还在磨蹭什么呢？再拖下去只会让敌人更有优势。还是说，你在最后一刻败给了你的多愁善感？”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai clicks his fingers impatiently.{/n} "Well? Why are we dawdling? Our delay may give the enemy the advantage. Or have you been overcome with sentimentality at the last moment?"

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋不耐烦地敲着手指。{/n}“嗯？我们还在磨蹭什么呢？再拖下去只会让敌人更有优势。还是说，你在最后一刻败给了你的多愁善感？”

languages.text: {n}Marazhai schnippt ungeduldig mit den Fingern.{/n} "Nun? Warum zaudern wir? Unser Zögern könnte dem Feind einen Vorteil verschaffen. Oder werdet Ihr im letzten Augenblick von der Sentimentalität übermannt?"
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai clicks his fingers impatiently.{/n} "Well? Why are we dawdling? Our delay may give the enemy the advantage. Or have you been overcome with sentimentality at the last moment?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai schnippt ungeduldig mit den Fingern.{/n} "Nun? Warum zaudern wir? Unser Zögern könnte dem Feind einen Vorteil verschaffen. Oder werdet Ihr im letzten Augenblick von der Sentimentalität übermannt?"

languages.text: {n}Marazhai chasquea impaciente los dedos.{/n} «¿Y bien? ¿A qué esperamos? Este retraso podría dar la ventaja a nuestros enemigos. ¿O acaso te ha dado un arrebato de sentimentalismo a última hora?».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai clicks his fingers impatiently.{/n} "Well? Why are we dawdling? Our delay may give the enemy the advantage. Or have you been overcome with sentimentality at the last moment?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai chasquea impaciente los dedos.{/n} «¿Y bien? ¿A qué esperamos? Este retraso podría dar la ventaja a nuestros enemigos. ¿O acaso te ha dado un arrebato de sentimentalismo a última hora?».

languages.text: {n}Marazhai claque des doigts d'un air impatient.{/n} « Eh bien ? Qu'attendons-nous ? L'ennemi pourrait prendre l'avantage si nous n'agissons pas rapidement. Ne me dites pas que vous vous êtes {mf|laissé|laissée} gagner par la sensiblerie au dernier moment. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai clicks his fingers impatiently.{/n} "Well? Why are we dawdling? Our delay may give the enemy the advantage. Or have you been overcome with sentimentality at the last moment?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai claque des doigts d'un air impatient.{/n} « Eh bien ? Qu'attendons-nous ? L'ennemi pourrait prendre l'avantage si nous n'agissons pas rapidement. Ne me dites pas que vous vous êtes {mf|laissé|laissée} gagner par la sensiblerie au dernier moment. »

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, sabırsızlıkla parmaklarını kütletiyor.{/n} "Ee? Neden oyalanıyoruz? Bekleyerek düşmana avantaj veriyor olabiliriz. Yoksa kendini bu son anların duygusallığına mı kaptırdın?"
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai clicks his fingers impatiently.{/n} "Well? Why are we dawdling? Our delay may give the enemy the advantage. Or have you been overcome with sentimentality at the last moment?"
